recommended_degree: Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Pemasaran Digital, Teknik Multimedia Digital, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Desain Grafis (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
● Monitor social media trends and suggest relevant content ideas
● Edit video through CapCut
● Design posters through Canva
● Plan, schedule, and post approved contents for i3L’s social media platforms (IG, FB,
TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn)
● Engage with followers by responding to comments and messages
● Track and report social media performance metrics
